item.title: Technology in Hotel Operations
item.description:
This undergraduate lecture introduces the role of Generative AI, automation, and digital tools in hotel operations.

Topics covered:

  • ChatGPT as a customer service agent
  • PMS and IoT integration in hotels
  • Active learning activity: AI trip planning simulation

üìù Materials available upon request.
